description: This should be moved to flathub testing channel not being present on stable release channel.
summary: No functionality is implemented. It's just a UI

description: It does not work properly. I don't now if the problem is the Flatpak package or the source, but anyway, it doesn't work as expected.

As far as I can tell, Lemmy's API were updated but this wasn't. Thus, nothing works. Clicking on something doesn't do anything, you can't login... 

From what I've read on Github, it seems that the dev currently doesn't have time to work on this. It's a shame because I loved the idea of it. It's a small project, hopefully it'll get better. I'll keep an eye on it.
Au démarage de l'application, des postes s'affichent mais il est impossible de cliquer dessus, ni sur le bouton Login...
